displayName.english: Taste some of Mama's home cookin', Adolf!

displayName.schinese: 尝些妈妈煮的家常菜，阿道夫！
displayName.japanese: これでも喰らえ、アドルフ！
displayName.brazilian: Experimente a comida caseira da mamãe, Adolf!

displayName.english: Don't get all stingy with your bullets

displayName.french: Ne lésinez pas sur les balles

description.italian: Uccidi 5.000 nemici di tutti i tipi

displayName.english: The head bone's connected to the...oh, wait
displayName.german: Die Wirbelsäule ist verbunden mit ... oh, Moment
displayName.french: La tête est rattachée au… non, attendez…
displayName.italian: Le ossa del cranio sono connesse a... oh, aspetta
displayName.spanish: El cráneo está unido a la… Oh, espera
displayName.schinese: 头部骨骼连接到……哦，等一下
displayName.russian: Кость черепа прикреплена к... ой, подождите
displayName.japanese: 頭蓋骨はここに繋がっていて…って撃つなよ！
displayName.polish: Z kości powstałeś, w kość... jak to szło?
displayName.brazilian: Os ossos da cabeça se conectam com o... Opa, espere um pouco

description.italian: Elimina 500 scheletri
description.spanish: Mata a 500 esqueletos.
description.schinese: 杀死 500 个骷髅
description.japanese: スケルトンを500体倒す
description.brazilian: Matar 500 esqueletos

displayName.english: Naughty little boys get what they deserve
displayName.german: Unartige kleine Jungs bekommen, was sie verdienen
displayName.italian: I ragazzini pestiferi hanno quel che si meritano
displayName.spanish: Los niños malos reciben su merecido
displayName.schinese: 顽皮的小男孩得到了他们应得的
displayName.brazilian: Garotos levados têm o que merecem

description.italian: Uccidi 100 cecchini zombi
description.spanish: Mata a 100 francotiradores zombi.

description.japanese: ゾンビスナイパーを100体倒す
description.brazilian: Eliminar 100 atiradores zumbis

displayName.english: We don't need a stretcher. We need a mop!
displayName.german: Wir brauchen keine Trage, wir brauchen einen Mop!
displayName.french: C'est une serpillière qu'il nous faut, pas un brancard
displayName.italian: Non ci serve una barella. Ci serve un mocio!
displayName.spanish: No necesitamos una camilla, ¡sino una fregona!
displayName.schinese: 我们不需要担架。我们需要拖把！
displayName.russian: Нам не нужен растягиватель. Нам нужна швабра!
displayName.japanese: タンカじゃなくてモップをよこせ！
displayName.brazilian: Não precisamos de uma maca, precisamos de um esfregão!

description.spanish: Mata a 50 zombis suicidas.

description.japanese: 特攻ゾンビを50体倒す
description.brazilian: Eliminar 50 zumbis suicidas

displayName.english: Good, bad, I'm the guy with the gun
displayName.german: Gut, böse, ich bin der Kerl mit der Knarre
displayName.french: Bon ou mauvais, ce qui compte c'est d'être armé
displayName.italian: Buono, cattivo... Io sono quello con il fucile
displayName.spanish: Bien, mal… Yo soy el que tiene un arma
displayName.schinese: 不管好还是坏，我是个佩枪的家伙
displayName.russian: Хороший, плохой, я парень с оружием
displayName.polish: Dobry czy zły, z kulką w łeb lądujesz ty
displayName.brazilian: Bom ou mau, sou o cara com a arma

displayName.english: We got this by the ass!

displayName.schinese: 我们轻而易举地做到了这一点！

displayName.french: J'ai envie de tirer sur un truc
displayName.spanish: Dame algo a lo que disparar

description.french: Tuer un sniper zombie en plein vol

displayName.english: We all go a little mad sometimes

displayName.italian: Ogni tanto tutti perdiamo la testa
displayName.schinese: 我们有些时候都有点疯狂
displayName.polish: Każdemu zdarza się wpaść w szał
displayName.brazilian: Todos nós temos um pico de loucura

description.french: Faire 10 tirs à la tête à la suite
description.italian: Ottieni una striscia di 10 colpi alla testa consecutivi
description.spanish: Consigue una racha de 10 tiros a la cabeza seguidos.

description.polish: Wykonaj nieprzerwaną serię 10 trafień w głowę
description.brazilian: Obter uma sequência ininterrupta de 10 tiros na cabeça

displayName.english: Like a drunk who's lost a bet
displayName.german: Wie ein Betrunkener, der 'ne Wette verloren hat
displayName.french: Comme un poivrot ayant perdu un pari
displayName.italian: L'ubriaco che ha perso la scommessa
displayName.spanish: Como un borracho que ha perdido una apuesta
displayName.japanese: 賭けに負けた酔っぱらいのようだ！
displayName.brazilian: Como um bêbado que perdeu a aposta

description.italian: Uccidi 20 nemici mentre si rialzano

description.brazilian: Eliminar 20 inimigos enquanto eles ressuscitam

displayName.english: Got you, didn't I, you little sucker!
displayName.schinese: 明白了，我难道没做到吗，你这个小蠢货！

description.english: Kill a Suicide Zombie by hitting his grenade
description.german: Töte einen Selbstmord-Zombie, indem du auf seine Granate schießt

description.spanish: Mata a un zombi suicida disparándole a la granada.

description.english: Get at least 10 for 1 with an explosive kill

description.spanish: Consigue al menos un 10x1 con una muerte explosiva.

description.polish: Zabij co najmniej 10 wrogów jednym wybuchem
description.brazilian: Obter pelo menos 10 por 1 com uma eliminação explosiva

displayName.english: My family's always been in meat

displayName.french: Je fais dans la viande hachée
displayName.italian: La mia è una famiglia di macellai
displayName.spanish: Mi familia siempre fue muy ahorradora
displayName.russian: У нас дома всегда было мясо
displayName.brazilian: O negócio da carne é de família

description.english: Get at least 15 for 1 with an explosive kill
description.french: Faire au moins 15 frags en une explosion
description.italian: Colpisci almeno 15 nemici mettendo a segno un'uccisione con esplosivo
description.spanish: Consigue al menos un 15x1 con una muerte explosiva.
description.schinese: 使用 1 个炸药杀死至少 15 个敌军
description.russian: Уничтожьте не менее 15 зомби одним взрывом
description.japanese: 1回の爆薬爆破で敵を15体倒す
description.polish: Zabij co najmniej 15 wrogów jednym wybuchem
description.brazilian: Obter pelo menos 15 por 1 com uma eliminação explosiva

displayName.english: Come and get it! It's a running buffet!
displayName.german: Komm und hol's dir! Ich bin ein Büfett auf zwei Beinen!
displayName.french: Je fais dans la viande hachée
displayName.italian: Venite e servitevi! Chi primo arriva, meglio mangia!
displayName.spanish: ¡Venid a por mí! ¡Soy un buffet libre!
displayName.schinese: 来拿吧！这是会跑的自助餐！
displayName.russian: Приди и возьми! Это бегущий фуршет!
displayName.japanese: さあさあ、踊り食いだよ！
displayName.brazilian: Venha pegar! É um banquete ambulante!

description.english: Get at least 20 for 1 with an explosive kill
description.french: Faire au moins 20 frags en une explosion
description.italian: Colpisci almeno 20 nemici mettendo a segno un'uccisione con esplosivo
description.spanish: Consigue al menos un 20x1 con una muerte explosiva.

description.brazilian: Obter pelo menos 20 por 1 com uma eliminação explosiva

displayName.english: Your blood pressure is zero over zero
displayName.french: Ta pression artérielle est au niveau zéro
displayName.italian: La tua pressione sanguigna è a zero
displayName.polish: Twoje ciśnienie to zero na zero
displayName.brazilian: Sua pressão sanguínea é de zero por zero

description.english: Headshot a Heavy Armour Zombie without removing his helmet
description.german: Erledige einen schwer gepanzerten Zombie per Kopfschuss, ohne ihm den Helm vom Kopf zu ballern
description.french: Toucher un zombie à l'armure lourde à la tête sans lui retirer son casque
description.italian: Colpisci alla testa uno zombi con armatura pesante senza rimuovere il suo elmetto
description.koreana: 중갑 좀비의 헬멧을 벗기지 않고 헤드샷을 성공시키십시오.
description.spanish: Pégale un tiro en la cabeza a un zombi blindado sin quitarle el casco.
description.schinese: 对 1 个穿着重型铠甲的僵尸实施爆头，而无需摘掉他的头盔
description.russian: Уничтожьте выстрелом в голову тяжелобронированного зомби, не снимая его шлем
description.japanese: 重装備ゾンビのヘルメットを落とさずにヘッドショットする
description.polish: Zabij strzałem w głowę opancerzonego zombie bez zdejmowania mu hełmu
description.brazilian: Atirar na cabeça de um zumbi com armadura pesada sem remover o capacete dele

displayName.french: Rien ne vaut un tir à la tête
displayName.italian: I colpi alla testa sono il meglio del meglio
displayName.spanish: Los tiros en la cabeza son lo mejor
displayName.japanese: ヘッドショットの達人
displayName.polish: Strzelanie w głowę to jest to
displayName.brazilian: Tiros na cabeça são o melhor

description.french: Battre 500 ennemis par des tirs à la tête
description.italian: Sconfiggi 500 nemici con colpi alla testa
description.spanish: Derrota a 500 enemigos con tiros en la cabeza.
description.schinese: 通过爆头打败 500 个敌军
description.japanese: ヘッドショットで敵を500体倒す
description.brazilian: Derrotar 500 inimigos com tiros na cabeça

description.italian: Scalcia o calpesta 50 nemici
description.spanish: Patea a 50 enemigos.
description.schinese: 踢倒 50 个敌军
description.japanese: 敵を50体蹴り倒す
description.brazilian: Chutar 50 inimigos

displayName.italian: Prendi questo e prova a rianimarti!

description.english: Score 5,000 with a  single sniper round
description.french: Faire un score de 5 000 en une seule balle de fusil à lunette
description.italian: Ottieni 5.000 punti con un solo proiettile da cecchino
description.spanish: Suma 5000 puntos con una sola ronda de francotirador.

description.japanese: 一発の狙撃でスコア5000を取る
description.brazilian: Fazer 5.000 pontos com um único cartucho carregado de precisão

displayName.english: I will not negotiate with the Undead!
displayName.italian: Nessun negoziato con i non morti!
displayName.schinese: 我是不会与不死族谈判的！
displayName.japanese: ゾンビとは交渉しない！

displayName.spanish: Nueve décimas partes de la ley

description.italian: Fatti possedere dal demonio

description.schinese: 着了魔
description.japanese: 取り憑かれ
description.brazilian: Ficar possuído

displayName.japanese: 悪魔の呼び出しに応える

description.italian: Rispondi al telefono

description.schinese: 拿起电话
description.japanese: 電話に出る

description.english: Save the man in the hospital

description.brazilian: Salvar o homem no hospital

description.english: Put the tortured souls in the Forest out of their misery
description.german: Erlöse die gequälten Seelen im Wald von ihrem Leid
description.french: Achever les âmes torturées de la forêt
description.italian: Metti fine alle sofferenze delle anime tormentate nella foresta
description.spanish: Acaba con la miseria de las almas atormentadas del bosque.
description.schinese: 让森林里饱受折磨的灵魂摆脱痛苦
description.russian: Избавьте терзаемые души в лесу от мучений
description.japanese: 森にはびこる魂を悲しみから救い出す
description.polish: Wybaw dusze w lesie od dalszego cierpienia
description.brazilian: Acabar com o sofrimento das almas na Floresta

displayName.french: Ne vous inquiétez pas, ils sont maléfiques !
displayName.polish: Nie przejmuj się, to samo zło!
displayName.brazilian: Não se preocupe, eles são do mal!

description.english: Shoot the 3 Zombie Ravens outside the Folterschloss
description.german: Erschieße die 3 Zombie-Raben vor dem Folterschloss
description.french: Tirer sur les 3 corbeaux zombies devant le Folterschloss

description.spanish: Dispara a los 3 cuervos zombi frente al Folterschloss.
description.schinese: 在福尔特城堡外射击 3 个僵尸乌鸦

description.polish: Zastrzel kruki zombie przed warownią Folterschloss
description.brazilian: Atirar nos 3 corvos zumbis fora do Folterschloss

displayName.english: Zombies, man, they creep me out!
displayName.german: Alter, bei Zombies krieg ich 'ne Gänsehaut
displayName.french: Ces zombies, ils me mettent les chocottes !
displayName.italian: Gli zombi mi fanno venire la pelle d'oca!
displayName.schinese: 伙计，僵尸可真是吓死我了！
displayName.japanese: ゾンビどもめ、薄気味悪いったらありゃしない！

description.english: Reach at least Wave 10 in Horde Mode – Waves of Despair
description.german: Erreiche mindestens Welle 10 im Horden-Modus – Wellen der Verzweiflung
description.french: Atteindre au moins la vague 10 en mode Horde - Vagues de désespoir

displayName.english: You're going to meet Death now...
displayName.german: Du wirst jetzt mit dem Sensenmann Bekanntschaft machen ...
displayName.french: Ces zombies, ils me mettent les chocottes !
displayName.japanese: これから直面するは死…

description.english: Reach at least Wave 10 in Horde Mode – No Sanctuary
description.german: Erreiche mindestens Welle 10 im Horden-Modus – Kein Zufluchtsort
description.french: Atteindre au moins la vague 10 en mode Horde - Pas de sanctuaire
description.italian: Raggiungi almeno l'ondata 10 in modalità Orda - Nessun riparo

description.spanish: Llega al menos a la oleada 10 en el modo Horda: Sin cuartel.

displayName.english: You're going to have to work for your meal

displayName.japanese: 働かざる者食うべからず
displayName.brazilian: Você terá que trabalhar se quiser comer

description.english: Reach at least Wave 10 in Horde Mode – Flood of Tears
description.german: Erreiche mindestens Welle 10 im Horden-Modus – Tränenflut
description.french: Atteindre au moins la vague 10 en mode Horde - Torrent des larmes

displayName.english: I'll teach ya how to shoot!
displayName.german: Ich zeig dir, wie man schießt!
displayName.japanese: 銃の撃ち方を教えてやる！

description.english: Reach at least Wave 10 with the highest score in any Horde Mode map
description.german: Erreiche mindestens Welle 10 im Horden-Modus mit der höchsten Punktzahl auf einer beliebigen Karte im Horden-Modus
description.french: Atteindre au moins la vague 10 avec le meilleur score sur toute carte du mode Horde

description.spanish: Llega al menos a la oleada 10 con la puntuación más alta en un mapa del modo Horda.
description.schinese: 在任何部落持久战模式地图中达到至少第 10 波并获得最高得分
description.russian: Достигните волны 10 с лучшим счетом на любой карте в режиме орды

description.english: Reach at least Wave 10 with more gold medals than your companions
description.german: Erreiche mindestens Welle 10 und mehr Goldmedaillen als deine Begleiter
description.french: Atteindre au moins la vague 10 avec plus de médailles d'or que ses compagnons
description.italian: Raggiungi almeno l'ondata 10 con più medaglie d'oro rispetto ai tuoi compagni
description.koreana: 동료들보다 더 많은 금메달로 웨이브 10에 도달하십시오.
description.spanish: Llega al menos a la oleada 10 con más medallas de oro que tus compañeros.
description.schinese: 达到至少第 10 波并获得多于同伴的金牌
description.russian: Достигните волны 10, получив больше золотых медалей, чем у ваших компаньонов
description.japanese: 仲間よりもゴールドメダルを多く獲得して、敵の襲撃を10回切り抜ける
description.polish: Dotrzyj co najmniej do fali 10 z większą liczbą złotych medali niż twoi towarzysze
description.brazilian: Alcançar pelo menos a leva 10 com mais medalhas de ouro que os seus companheiros

description.english: Kill 50 enemies that are actively attacking other players
description.german: Töte 50 Gegner, die aktiv andere Spieler angreifen
description.french: Tuer 50 ennemis attaquant activement d'autres joueurs

description.spanish: Mata a 50 enemigos que estén atacando a otros jugadores.
description.schinese: 杀死 50 个正积极攻击其他玩家的敌军
description.japanese: 他のプレイヤーを攻撃している最中の敵を50体以上倒す
description.polish: Zabij 50 wrogów aktywnie atakujących innych graczy
description.brazilian: Eliminar 50 inimigos que estão atacando efetivamente outros jogadores

description.italian: Rianima altri giocatori 50 volte
description.spanish: Revive a otros jugadores 50 veces.
description.schinese: 复活其他玩家 50 次
description.japanese: 他のプレイヤーを50回復活させる
description.brazilian: Reanimar outros jogadores 50 vezes

description.italian: Uccidi 20 super élite in co-op
description.spanish: Mata a 20 élites en el cooperativo.
description.schinese: 在合作的情况下杀死 20 个精英
description.russian: Уничтожьте 20 элитных зомби в режиме совместной игры
description.japanese: CO-OPでエリートを20体倒す
description.polish: Zabij 20 członków Super-elity w trybie współpracy
description.brazilian: Eliminar 20 Elites no modo cooperativo

displayName.english: You're so dead, you don't even know it
displayName.german: Du bist so was von tot, du weißt es nur noch nicht
displayName.french: Vous êtes plus morts que morts
displayName.italian: Sei morto, che più morto non si può
displayName.spanish: Estás muerto, pero aún no lo sabes
displayName.schinese: 你真该死，你甚至都不知道这一点
displayName.russian: Ты такой мертвый, что даже не догадываешься об этом
displayName.japanese: お前はすでに死んでいる
displayName.polish: Nawet nie wiecie, jak bardzo jesteście martwi
displayName.brazilian: Você está tão morto que nem sabe disso

description.english: Complete any Campaign chapter in 4-player co-op at any difficulty level
description.german: Schließe ein beliebiges Kampagnen-Kapitel im 4-Spieler-Koop auf einem beliebigem Schwierigkeitsgrad ab
description.french: Terminer tout chapitre de campagne en mode coopération 4 joueurs sur toute difficulté
description.italian: Completa qualsiasi capitolo della campagna in co-op a 4 giocatori in qualsiasi livello di difficoltà
description.koreana: 아무 난이도로 4인 협동 모드의 아무 캠페인 챕터를 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Completa cualquier capítulo de la campaña en el cooperativo de 4 jugadores, en cualquier dificultad.
description.schinese: 在任何难度级别于 4 人合作模式下完成任何战役章节
description.russian: Завершите любую главу кампании в совместном режиме на 4 игрока на любом уровне сложности
description.japanese: 4人CO-OPでいずれかのキャンペーンをクリアする（難易度問わず）
description.polish: Ukończ dowolny rozdział kampanii w 4-osobowym trybie współpracy na dowolnym poziomie trudności
description.brazilian: Concluir qualquer capítulo de campanha em modo cooperativo de 4 jogadores em qualquer nível de dificuldade

displayName.german: Am Boden, aber nicht am Ende
displayName.russian: На земле, но еще в бою
displayName.polish: Może i leżę, ale jeszcze kopię

description.english: Kill a total of 20 enemies while incapacitated
description.german: Töte insgesamt 20 Gegner, während du kampfunfähig bist
description.french: Tuer un total de 20 ennemis en étant blessé
description.italian: Uccidi un totale di 20 nemici mentre incapacitato

description.spanish: Mata a un total de 20 enemigos estando incapacitado.
description.schinese: 在丧失行为能力的情况下共杀死 20 个敌军
description.japanese: 戦闘不能状態の時に敵を合計20体倒す
description.brazilian: Eliminar um total de 20 inimigos enquanto estiver incapacitado

displayName.english: Man, you sure know a lot about monsters

displayName.french: Vous avez l'air de vous y connaître en monstres

displayName.russian: Чувак, ты точно много знаешь о монстрах
displayName.japanese: モンスターにお詳しいようで
displayName.brazilian: Cara, você realmente sabe bastante sobre monstros

description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de supervivientes.

description.polish: Zrealizuj każdą z misji pobocznych ocalonych
description.brazilian: Concluir todas as missões secundárias de sobrevivência

displayName.english: We have a Judas in our midst!

displayName.french: Un Judas se trouve dans les parages !
displayName.italian: C'è un Giuda tra di noi!

description.japanese: 生存者を殺す

displayName.english: Gratuitous violence from the lot of you
displayName.italian: Violenza gratuita da parte di tutti
displayName.schinese: 你命中无理的暴力行为
displayName.japanese: 理由なく攻撃的な多重人格者
displayName.polish: Bezinteresowna przemoc dla każdego z was

description.english: Complete levels as every playable character
description.german: Schließe Levels als jeder spielbare Charakter ab
description.french: Terminer les niveaux avec chaque personnage jouable
description.italian: Completa livelli nei panni di ogni personaggio giocante

displayName.english: Just in case we make it

description.italian: Raccogli tutte le barre d'oro

description.schinese: 收集每块金条
description.japanese: ゴールドバーを全て回収する
description.brazilian: Coletar todas as barras de ouro

displayName.english: They must be destroyed on sight!
displayName.schinese: 它们必须在视线之内被摧毁！

description.english: Find and shoot every Bottle of Blood
description.german: Finde und schieße auf jedes Blutfläschchen
description.french: Trouver et tirer sur chaque bouteille de sang
description.italian: Trova e spara a tutte le bottiglie di sangue
description.spanish: Encuentra y dispara a todas las botellas de sangre.
description.schinese: 找到并射击每瓶血液
description.russian: Найдите и расстреляйте все бутылки с кровью
description.japanese: 血液ボトルを全て発見して銃で撃つ
description.polish: Znajdź i zestrzel wszystkie butelki z krwią
description.brazilian: Encontrar e atirar em todas as garrafas de sangue

displayName.italian: La morte... ti circonda da tutti i lati
displayName.brazilian: A morte está... ao seu redor

description.english: Reach Wave 10 in Horde Mode – Dead End
description.french: Atteindre la vague 10 en mode Horde - Cul-de-sac
description.italian: Raggiungi almeno l'ondata 10 in modalità Orda - Vicolo cieco
description.koreana: 좀비떼 모드 - 막다른 길에서 웨이브 10에 도달하십시오.
description.spanish: Llegue a la oleada 10 del modo Horda: Callejón sin salida.
description.schinese: 在部落持久战模式下达到第 10 波 – 死胡同
description.russian: Достигните волны 10 в режиме орды — Тупик
description.japanese: ホードモード「デッドエンド」で、敵の襲撃を10回切り抜ける
description.polish: Dotrzyj do fali 10 w trybie hordy — Ślepy zaułek
description.brazilian: Chegar à leva 10 no Modo de Horda: Beco sem saída

displayName.english: They're coming to get you, Barbra!
displayName.german: Sie kommen, um dich zu holen, Barbra!
displayName.japanese: 奴らが来るぞ、バーブラ！
displayName.brazilian: Eles estão vindo pegar você, Barbra!

description.english: Reach Wave 10 in Horde Mode – Dead Man's Bluff
description.german: Erreiche Welle 10 im Horden-Modus – Die Klippe des toten Mannes
description.french: Atteindre la vague 10 en mode Horde - Falaise de la mort
description.italian: Raggiungi almeno l'ondata 10 in modalità Orda - Rupe del morto
description.koreana: 좀비떼 모드 - 망자의 절벽에서 웨이브 10에 도달하십시오.
description.spanish: Llegue a la oleada 10 del modo Horda: Mejora del hombre muerto.
description.schinese: 在部落持久战模式下达到第 10 波 – 死人的断崖
description.russian: Достигните волны 10 в режиме орды — Утес мертвеца
description.japanese: ホードモード「死者の虚勢」で、敵の襲撃を10回切り抜ける
description.polish: Dotrzyj do fali 10 w trybie hordy — Trupie urwisko
description.brazilian: Chegar à leva 10 no Modo de Horda: Blefe do homem morto
